name: lmstudio-chat
description: Chat participant for LM Studio local API

chatParticipants.name: lmstudio
chatParticipants.description: Chat with your local LM Studio models

commands.name: models
commands.description: List available models in LM Studio

commands.name: review
commands.description: Review workspace code with full project context

lmstudio.apiBaseUrl.description: API base URL for LM Studio

lmstudio.model.description: Model name to use in LM Studio (leave empty to auto-detect)

lmstudio.systemPrompt.default: You are a helpful coding assistant. When code is provided as context, read it carefully and thoroughly before responding. Base your answers on the actual code, not assumptions.
lmstudio.systemPrompt.description: System prompt sent with every request

lmstudio.maxFileSize.description: Maximum number of characters to include per file in context

lmstudio.maxHistoryTurns.description: Maximum number of conversation turns to include in history

lmstudio.temperature.description: Sampling temperature for model responses (0 = deterministic, 2 = most creative)

lmstudio.maxTokens.description: Maximum tokens in model response (higher = longer, more detailed answers)

lmstudio.reviewInclude.description: Glob pattern for files to include in /review (default covers common source languages)

lmstudio.reviewExclude.description: Glob pattern for files to exclude from /review (default excludes build output, tests, and generated files)
